multi-cloud-data-migrator.description: Migrate massive data volumes with resumable jobs and memory safeguards.

sourceorg.description: Alias or username of source org
sourceorg.name: sourceorg

targetorg.description: Alias or username of target org
targetorg.name: targetorg

config.description: Name of the configuration file to use (e.g., 'rca')
config.name: config

where.description: Global SOQL WHERE clause to append to all queries
where.name: where

object.description: From config file: comma-separated list of sObjects to migrate with optional fields and WHERE clauses, e.g., "Account(Name, Phone, WHERE: Type = 'Customer')"
object.name: object

filter-only.description: Apply filters from --object to the full migration plan instead of migrating only the specified objects.
filter-only.name: filter-only

migrationplan.description: Show the migration plan from the specified configuration file
migrationplan.name: migrationplan

list-sobjects.description: For internal UI use. Lists SObjects from a given config file as JSON.
list-sobjects.name: list-sobjects

custom-query.description: Directly provide a SOQL query for a single object migration.
custom-query.name: custom-query

custom-sobject.description: The API name of the SObject for the custom query.
custom-sobject.name: custom-sobject

custom-ext-id.description: The External ID field for the SObject in the custom query.
custom-ext-id.name: custom-ext-id

custom-composite-key.description: Comma-separated fields for a composite key when using a custom query (e.g., 'Name,Custom_Field__c').
custom-composite-key.name: custom-composite-key

resume.description: Resume a migration by providing the path to its state file (e.g., migrationJob-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS.json).
resume.name: resume

standalone-deep-clone.description: Provide a Product SKU to use as a parameter in a specialized config file (e.g., pcm).
standalone-deep-clone.name: standalone-deep-clone

export-csv.description: Export records to a directory of CSV files instead of migrating to a target org.
export-csv.name: export-csv

import-csv.description: Import records from a directory of CSV files instead of a source org.
import-csv.name: import-csv

destroy.description: Enable destructive migration. Deletes records in target org based on config before migration. Requires --targetorg and --config.
destroy.name: destroy

hard-delete.description: Permanently delete records (Empty Recycle Bin) during destructive phase. Default is Soft Delete.
hard-delete.name: hard-delete

request-license.description: Generate an activation request code to send to the license provider.
request-license.name: request-license

extend.description: Provide an encrypted license key to activate or extend the license.
extend.name: extend

licensestatus.description: Check the remaining days on the license.
licensestatus.name: licensestatus

multi-cloud-data-migrator:ui.summary: Launches the Multi-Cloud Migrator graphical user interface.
